ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Cleric Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t get me wrong.  I value your input, I really do.  But I ve got one word for you - punctuation .  Love it, use it.  Thank you. And while you re at it,
ygData.messageBody:
Don't get me wrong. I value your input, I really do. But I've got
one word for you - "punctuation". Love it, use it. Thank you.

And while you're at it, take a little time and proofread.
It's "spectres" btw.

> Okay the sentries is on an Isalnd with gargoyles and specteres on
>it
>dont worry spectetres ar3 part of her duty (ill explain it in a minute)
>from
>the sister dock go straight out to the goblin island you will come to the
>Oracle if you face his directionj teh follow the shore to your left adn
>keep
>an eye on your right youll see an island come to view shes on this one swim
>straight out and when you get on the island she spawns to the right of
>where
>you first hit shore. What happens when she spawns go shell sit there
>for
>about a minute andf then go and confront the 4 specteres in the middle of
>the island and of course she dies now whether or not the potion will keep
>her alive im not sure on Povar she has not spawned since i have been there
>but about 2 times and i have been on that island for about 3 weeks i think
>spawn is messed up OH yeah watch pout for Mojo mthe Tainted bad goblin ahs
>pet to.
